il.ac.hit.couponstoreu.controller

Class LoginServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • il.ac.hit.couponstoreu.controller.LoginServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/LoginServlet")
public class LoginServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet implementation class LoginServlet This Servlet manage the login and sign in process and keeps objects relevant for the normal users and administrator users in session for further use.
    Author:
    nadav Eliyahu.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • Authenticate

        public boolean Authenticate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res,
                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
                     throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                            java.io.IOException
        This method check the user input in the login or sign up fields against the Data Base for matching user name and password. The method returns a boolean value of true if the user name and password match those in the data base.
        Parameters:
        res - the res is this CouponUserServlet response object that holds the reference to server response. @see HttpServletResponse.
        req - the req is this CouponUserServlet request object that holds the reference to the user request. @see HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        boolean value authFlag.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException

      • PermissionsCheck

        public boolean PermissionsCheck(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res,
                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
                         throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                java.io.IOException
        This method check the users permissions aginst the database when user log in or sign up. This method returns a boolean value of true if the UserDAO class method checkPermission returned true.
        Parameters:
        res - the res is this CouponUserServlet response object that holds the reference to server response. @see HttpServletResponse.
        req - the req is this CouponUserServlet request object that holds the reference to the user request. @see HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        boolean value perFlag .
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException

      • gotoWebApplication

        public void gotoWebApplication(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                        throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                               java.io.IOException
        This method redirect the user request to the application if the user is authenticated.
        Parameters:
        request - the request is this CouponUserServlet request object that holds the reference to the user request.
        response - the response is this CouponUserServlet response object that holds the reference to server response.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if there was a wrong user request
        java.io.IOException - if there was a bad response from the server.
